name: com.chartboost.helium
description: The Helium Unity SDK by Chartboost: Better monetization powered by bidding

samples.description: Base dependencies for the Helium package. These are required.
Support for the AdColony advertisement network.
Support for the Google AdMob advertisement network.
Support for the Google Amazon advertisement network.
Support for the Google AppLovin advertisement network.
Support for the Google Facebook advertisement network.
Support for the Google Fyber advertisement network.
Support for the Google InMobi advertisement network.
Support for the Google IronSource advertisement network.
Support for the Google Mintegral advertisement network.
Support for the Google Pangle advertisement network.
Support for the Google TapJoy advertisement network.
Support for the Google UnityAds advertisement network.
Support for the Google Vungle advertisement network.
Support for the Google Yahoo/Verizon advertisement network.
